topics.body:
Call me crazy, but what I see for the future of human space travel is:
The moon is a metaphorical bus stop for travelling further in space.
Mars is a long term terraforming project.
Venus is a VERY long term terraforming project.
Ceres is the asteroid mining hub; sort of like human race's second home, but also a metaphorical bus stop for deep space travel.
Jupiter's moons are for DEEP space travel hubs.
Eris and Sedna are the last stops on the bus route.
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557e052763687251b6003fb9#post_557e052763687251b6003fb9
We're talking about ~400 years of terraforming; by then I don't even think we'll look human anymore.
